channel.title: My Car Story With Lou Page
channel.description: My Car Story With Lou Page

item.title: Crafting a Pristine 1969 COPO Camaro
item.description: Follow the meticulous restoration of a rare 1969 COPO Camaro, refined through thousands of hours of careful work. Which detail of the rebuild stands out to you?

media:content.media:title: Crafting a Pristine 1969 COPO Camaro
media:content.media:description: Follow the meticulous restoration of a rare 1969 COPO Camaro, refined through thousands of hours of careful work. Which detail of the rebuild stands out to you?
media:content.media:credit: My Car Story With Lou Page

item.title: Restored and Rare: Touring a 90% Original Plymouth Valiant 100 Wagon
item.description: This remarkably preserved Valiant 100 wagon offers a rare look at Plymouth’s practical classic. With most of its original components intact, the tour highlights its condition, charm, and the appeal of a survivor‑grade family hauler.

media:content.media:title: Restored and Rare: Touring a 90% Original Plymouth Valiant 100 Wagon
media:content.media:description: This remarkably preserved Valiant 100 wagon offers a rare look at Plymouth’s practical classic. With most of its original components intact, the tour highlights its condition, charm, and the appeal of a survivor‑grade family hauler.
media:content.media:credit: My Car Story With Lou Page

item.title: Salvaged from the Junkyard: 1969 Pontiac Grand Prix
item.description: Once left for scrap, this 1969 Grand Prix gets a second chance. From its bold styling to its hidden potential, this breakdown explores how a forgotten Pontiac was rescued and what makes it worth restoring.

media:content.media:title: Salvaged from the Junkyard: 1969 Pontiac Grand Prix
media:content.media:description: Once left for scrap, this 1969 Grand Prix gets a second chance. From its bold styling to its hidden potential, this breakdown explores how a forgotten Pontiac was rescued and what makes it worth restoring.
media:content.media:credit: My Car Story With Lou Page

item.title: Iconic 1969 COPO Camaro with the 427ci V8
item.description: Built for performance and produced in extremely limited numbers, the 1969 COPO Camaro remains one of Chevrolet’s most legendary muscle cars. This piece highlights its powerful 427 engine, its purpose‑built origins, and why collectors still chase these rare machines.

media:content.media:title: Iconic 1969 COPO Camaro with the 427ci V8
media:content.media:description: Built for performance and produced in extremely limited numbers, the 1969 COPO Camaro remains one of Chevrolet’s most legendary muscle cars. This piece highlights its powerful 427 engine, its purpose‑built origins, and why collectors still chase these rare machines.
media:content.media:credit: My Car Story With Lou Page

item.description: Discover the design, history, and character of this mid-’60s family wagon. Would you drive a classic like this today?

item.title: 340 Six Barrel: Powering the AAR ’Cuda
item.description: A quick look at the famed 340 Six Barrel engine that defined the 1970 AAR ’Cuda’s performance and reputation. What made this setup so special?

item.title: 1951 Hudson Hornet Classic Spotlight
item.description: Explore the design and legacy of the 1951 Hudson Hornet, a true icon of early performance engineering. Why does it still captivate collectors today?
